common_0305_select_01: What do they mean by treasure?
common_0305_rival_03:
Yeah, fair question, since it’s your first time!
C’mon, let’s walk and talk...[npcn:4]
common_0305_rival_04a:
The Treasure Hunt is a huge part of the Naranja
Academy school year.[npcn:4]
common_0305_rival_04b:
The Treasure Hunt is a huge part of the Uva
Academy school year.[npcn:4]
common_0305_rival_05:
The point isn’t to get us all looking for some
actual hidden treasure, necessarily...[npcn:4]
common_0305_rival_06:
We’re more just making our own adventures to
see what experiences Paldea’s got to offer![npcn:4]
common_0305_rival_07:
You could try to beat Pokémon Gyms, you could
help out people in need... You could hunt for\r
real capital-T treasure if you wanted, even![npcn:4]
common_0305_rival_08:
There’s stuff we’d never learn sitting in a
classroom, y’know? This is our chance to learn it![npcn:4]
common_0305_rival_09:
Plus there’s so many chances to battle, which is
obviously perfect for me![npcn:4]
common_0305_rival_10:
You and me for sure gotta battle if we run into
each other out there! Hope you’re ready![npcn:4]
